LIBFLIAPI FLISetFilterPos

(flidev_t dev, long filter)

Set the filter wheel position of a given device.

Documentation

Set the filter wheel position of a given device. Use this function to set the filter wheel position of dev to filter.
Parameters:
dev - Filter wheel device handle.
filter - Desired filter wheel position.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.
See Also:
FLIGetFilterPos

Alphabetic index
